attributes.review: Took 2 hours to download when first installed, just to tell me it needed an update. Once the update downloaded, nothing would load. (I tried launching the app in several locations, so not lack of stable connection) And due to the disappearance of all the content, I tried to delete the app and redownload it, but the same process happened. Tried the process 4 times. Wasted hours I can never get back. Awful.
attributes.title: Biggest Waste Of Time

attributes.review: The app wouldn’t open for about a week, and when it finally did, it crashed my phone for ANOTHER week. Terribly made. From what I saw before my phone crashed, it is bad quality. I wanted to stay updated, so I looked on the news. Apparently Trump hasn’t done anything he’s said he would, he’s just making us go backwards. What is this, the 1800’s? Not to mention Trump is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, and sexist. Terrible president and a terrible person. ☺️
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review:
I got this app to further my racist and homophobic ideals and support MY president but the app kept glitching. I first opened it and it immediately showed me a picture of a Cheeto. I don’t remember downloading a Cheeto sponsored app! I was so excited to finally show some support for my favorite president 🤩🤩🤩 and his hateful views but I can’t keep an app that keeps glitching on my phone! Don’t download this app because you’ll just be disappointed like I am 😢.

#BringObamaBackAgain2020
attributes.title: Really disappointed 😔

attributes.review: This app made me feel suicidal. I almost killed myself because of this app. My mental health is at an all times low because of Donald trump. He hurts my self esteem. He also gives me anxiety. This app has been hell for me. So much ads and this app gave my phone a virus please help. It’s a really slow app. This app makes me feel racist and homophobic. I’m currently have a panic attack because of the app. If you’re 50 and above done get the app it’s given me seizures.#AllAppsLivesMatter
attributes.title: The worst App I’ve ever owned😭

attributes.review: The incompetence in this app is ASTRONOMICAL! Its all “fake news” don’t listen and get a mind of your own!! By saying that people who don’t share your beliefs are of special needs, they are not only     offensive to people of special needs, but they are discriminating to people of other beliefs. And this is what you Trump supporters are saying. This just shows the kind of people Trump supporters are. This kind of app in the App Store is encouraging this behavior and should therefore be removed IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: This app is the most disgusting thing I’ve witnessed. The moment I download it, all of my credit card information was posted online. I received countless notifications that the trump administration had been trying to buy things called “body pillows” and something called “Yagami Yato Audio”. I don’t know what a Yagami is, but whatever it is, trump was trying to get it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It releases all of your credit card information and gives it to the Yato!!!
attributes.title: This is disgusting

attributes.review: I have heard a lot of bad things about this app so I figured I should hate on it.🧃 First to start off this app is TERRIBLE.🤮🤡❌ It took WEEKS to download and it crashed SO BAD I had to get a new phone.🤡🤡 When I opened the app I saw a UGLY and HORRIFYING face.🤮🤮 It’s was trumps face.🤮🤮🤡🤡 After seeing his face I had nightmares.✨ Not even 8 weeks of therapy would fix the nightmares from seeing his fugly face.🤮🤡 This app causes me sleep paralysis, nightmares, non stop puking, ghost sightings and headaches.🦗🦗 🚨DO NOT GET THIS APP🚨
attributes.title: This app gave me sleep paralysis

attributes.review: This is the wort app in the universe. I downloaded it and it took all of my money. Then I here pounding on my door and he sent ICE to take my grandma. Even though she is legal. I fought with them so they called the police to kill my black friend. Then my doors started to disappear. I contacted the email and they sent back the minion booty picture from Despicable me. After that someone came to my house and raped my dogs and cats. And they made me watch. I am permanently traumatized. Don’t download this app.
attributes.title: I am traumatized

attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to America, it is absolutely horrible and has a really dark meaning behind it. I can’t unsee such piece of trash. But I also feel bad for the disgusting, irritating, and racist orange... I really wish he had a brain to think correctly, since his is malfunctioning 😓 it seems to happen since the beginning of his existence. This app won’t let me live in peace 😪 in conclusion, since trump won’t let us have a life. I don’t think he deserves one either🤩
attributes.title: Disgusting 🤢

attributes.review: The app is horrible all I see is Donald Trump‘s face and it looks like orange I do not want to eat oranges anymore and it’s just disgusting how he trying to do everything he wants no he’s a president only for a couple more days and I just hate I just hate him and he hast to just be gone and this is ridiculous how people vote for him and I do not want to see his orange looking face anymore he is disgusting and I hate this app this app is no longer here please take it down thank you.🟠🟧
attributes.title: Hey the app....
